resources.name: Lightweight JS pathfinding genetic programming
resources.description: The idea is to present light weight (Java Script written) genetic programming. There are graphs (using Google's API) for monitoring the optimization process and game-link controlers to control the parameters of the evaluations.

resources.name: Medical Flow Graph Creator
resources.description: Medical flow graph creator for the PKPD graph-based simulation, allowing to create with simple GUI an in-vivo flow graph using the P5.js library.

resources.name: Infinite run game in Unity (C#)
resources.description: An Indine game made in Unity (C#) of 3d infinity runer taking place in space. A smart memory management by creating and destraction of objects according to the potentional pathes of the user is included.
resources.authors: Alexi, A., Spitzer, N., Lazebnik, T.

resources.name: The OCTI board game with several levels of AI players
resources.description: The OCTI board game with nice UI-UX and several levels of AI players.

resources.name: Mathematical course about dynamic systems
resources.description: A Hebrew summary (40 pages, hand written) of a dyanmic systems mathematics course in BIU at 2017.

resources.name: A python class generator
resources.description: Allowing to build a class file using code for on-run class generation and meta-class analysis.

resources.name: CSV to Latex Table Generator
resources.description: A one page CSV to Latex convertor online tool (with pure js). The aim is to allow quick convertion of CSV tables into the corosponading LaTex table code.

resources.name: Tower collapse game in Unity
resources.description: A simple 3d game allowing to build a tower from blocks with enemies trying to hit and destroy your tower. Developed in Unity, C#.
resources.authors: Alexi, A., Spitzer, N., Lazebnik, T.

resources.name: Home Darts ScoreBoard
resources.description: A darts scoreboard for home use (Python, JS).

resources.name: Pubmed and arXiv paper downloader
resources.description: The project written in Java allowing a user to download full papers from both PubMed and arXiv.

resources.name: Academic PDF to TXT
resources.description: The project written in Java allowing a user to convert academic papers in a PDF format to a TXT extracting the text of the paper using several techniques. Currently, it support the following geometrical format elements popular in academic papers: 1. 2 coloum texts - by spliting the page into 2 pages, one per coloum. 2. Graphs, tables and images - finding the boundery of each one of them in a page and removing it by overriding with white rectangle. 3. Equeations - the OCR providing short and non-words from equeations which is mostly cleared in the post-processing stage.

resources.name: Simple (yet effective) General Semantic Analysis
resources.description: General Semantic Analysis demo fully develped in Vanila JS. Checkout the whatsapp chat analysis - a lot of fun.

resources.name: Game of Life COVID-19 Spread analysis
resources.description: A JS (p5 + Google Charts) implementation of the game of life simulating COVID-19 spread in the population.

resources.name: Assosiative Words Grouper
resources.description: A (pure JS written) GUI allowing to load lists of source and target words (from associative experiments) and build similarity groups.
